metadata.name: Visual Studio NodejsTools PressAnyKey Arbitrary Binary Execution
metadata.comment: Detects child processes of Microsoft.NodejsTools.PressAnyKey.exe that can be used to execute any other binary

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\microsoft.nodejstools.pressanykey.exe')))

output.summary: Detects child processes of Microsoft.NodejsTools.PressAnyKey.exe that can be used to execute any other binary

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate use by developers as part of NodeJS development with Visual Studio Tools References: https://twitter.com/mrd0x/status/1463526834918854661, https://gist.github.com/nasbench/a989ce64cefa8081bd50cf6ad8c491b5
